targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "namespace_name" = 'haystack-apps' AND "container_name" = 'trace-indexer' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "pod_name"

alert.message:
Kafka reads have gone down the threshold limit, possible cases:
a) span-collector is not pushing the spans to kafka
b) kafka may be down
c) Check indexer
alert.name: Trace Indexer- drop in Kafka spans reads
Trace Indexer- Kafka Iterator Age alert

panels.description:
If  eviction happens, 
it implies that stitch operation has not completed in memory. 
This may happen either due to increase in traffic or we are not running enough containers to stitch the incoming spans.
panels.title: In-Memory Store Cache Eviction

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in ES write time.
alert.name: Trace Indexer- increase in ES write time

alert.message: This is an alert for drop in ES write rate.

alert.message: This is an alert for increase in Cassandra write time.

targets.query: SELECT "write.time.99thPercentile" FROM "haystack.traces.indexer" WHERE "class" = 'backend' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
